attributes.action: Stop remainers from interfering with the brexit decisions.
attributes.additional_details:
There are petitions constantly seen online such as Facebook to stop brexit from happening and there are far too many protests especially in London that is causing constant threat and concern to our country. We should allow our PM to exit the EU with out Parliament and without interuptions of remainers that are being brainwashed and supported by the EU.
Make Britain Great again.
attributes.background: Remainers are constantly interfering with brexit by putting up petitions and protesting against it the truth is we voted out so this is to stop all protests and remainers petitions so our pm can get on with his job and get us out of the EU with the best outcome that is good for our future.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
